physical_object.name: yellow rectangular cleaning sponge with green scrub side

assignments.utilization_method: Place the sponge flat on the surface with the yellow soft side facing upward; deliver the downward blow to the center of that surface.

physical_object.name: black and grey cushioned office chair

assignments.utilization_method: No method available for this object

physical_object.name: folded umbrella with black and white checkered fabric and curved handle

assignments.utilization_method: Hold the curved handle with a relaxed full-hand grip so the folded shaft extends forward

physical_object.name: white table fan with protective grill and round base

assignments.utilization_method: Grasp the neck column just below the grill with one hand, lift the fan clear of the desk, and swing the heavy grill end downward like an axe head.

physical_object.name: large Apple iMac desktop monitor with silver stand

assignments.utilization_method: Slip one hand around the thin neck of the silver stand close to the base and swing the screen forward and downward in a short arc while maintaining that grip.

physical_object.name: white spray bottle filled with blue liquid

assignments.utilization_method: Clasp the cylindrical neck just below the trigger, point the nozzle outward, and sweep the bottle in repeated inward arcs.
